title: Blended Mathematics Leadership Course Based on Adult Learner Needs (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts (Secondary Level)
context.additional_context: Targeting novice mathematics practitioners in managerial/leadership roles. Requires customized learning design utilizing ERG theory and OBL (Object-Based Learning) approaches, including smartphone-based supplementary learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the three core needs of ERG theory (existence, relatedness, growth) to derive individual learning motivation factors.
Learners achieve at least 80% participation by linking online and offline activities in a blended learning environment.
Learners accurately solve foundational mathematical problems (e.g., statistics, ratio calculations) required in workplace settings at least twice out of three attempts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
